description.@en: The winds of Magick bend to your whim. In the face of violence, you’ve learned to control the emergent forces of chaos. You weave Æthereal energies to the betterment of your Magicks.

effect.@en: Foes who are made subject to your Magicks must spend one additional Action Point to properly Counterspell. In addition, you penalize your foe’s ability to Resist your Magicks by a -10 Base Chance.
